help-file.title: "SPELL FAILURE"
help-file.content: A caster who has practiced specific spells for a long period of time becomes very skilled at casting the spells. He is able to work his magic without fear of error or incorrectly invoking magic. So, as he gains in levels, the lower spells become second nature to him. However, when he is charged with learning new spells of a more complicated nature than he is used to, he may find it difficult to cast without error. So, casters will find that they sometimes cannot cast a spell of their highest circle every time they try. Expect spell failure as you are learning the spells and are not yet a master of their powers.
